services.title: Business Law Consultation
services.shortDescription: 60-minute strategy session covering business formation, governance, and compliance questions.
services.details: Includes a structured review of existing corporate documents, clarification of shareholder rights, identification of regulatory risks, and a written action plan with next steps.

services.title: Car Accident Claims
services.shortDescription: In-person meeting to evaluate auto accident claims, available evidence, and settlement strategy.
services.details: Analyzes police reports and medical records, explains insurance communications, outlines negotiation milestones, and provides a tailored roadmap for litigation or settlement.

services.title: Construction Law Advisory
services.shortDescription: Hybrid advisory engagement for developers navigating contracts, permits, and dispute prevention.
services.details: Audits construction agreements, identifies risk allocation gaps, reviews permit obligations, and delivers a compliance checklist covering every project phase.

services.title: Contract Drafting & Review
services.shortDescription: Online collaborative drafting and redlining for business agreements and vendor contracts.
services.details: Translates business goals into enforceable clauses, revises indemnity and liability language, and delivers an annotated markup with a plain-language summary memo.

services.title: Criminal Defense Strategy
services.shortDescription: In-person strategy session for clients facing misdemeanor or felony charges.
services.details: Assesses case posture, reviews discovery and evidence, recommends plea or trial tactics, and coordinates an investigation timeline with key milestones.

services.title: Employment Law Compliance
services.shortDescription: Hybrid workshop for HR teams updating policies, handbooks, and training materials.
services.details: Audits policies for federal and state compliance, drafts corrective language, trains managers on disciplinary workflows, and supplies an implementation schedule.

services.title: Estate Planning Package
services.shortDescription: Virtual estate planning bundle with wills, powers of attorney, and trust guidance.
services.details: Collects family asset profiles, drafts customized documents, coordinates notary execution, and provides a maintenance checklist with digital vault setup.

services.title: Family Law Mediation
services.shortDescription: Hybrid mediation designed to resolve custody and property disputes amicably.
services.details: Facilitates interest-based negotiations, documents tentative agreements, coordinates parenting plan drafts, and provides a clear court filing roadmap.

services.title: Immigration Law Support
services.shortDescription: Online support preparing immigration petitions, evidence packets, and interview coaching.
services.details: Evaluates visa eligibility, assembles supporting documentation, drafts persuasive cover letters, schedules mock interviews, and outlines agency timelines.

services.title: Insurance Claims Advocacy
services.shortDescription: Hybrid representation for contested insurance claims and appeals.
services.details: Reviews policy language and denial letters, crafts appeal packages, negotiates with adjusters, and coordinates expert testimony when required.

services.title: Intellectual Property Protection
services.shortDescription: Online counsel on safeguarding trademarks, copyrights, and patents.
services.details: Conducts clearance searches, prepares filing strategies, drafts licensing terms, builds an enforcement playbook, and delivers a registration calendar.

services.title: Medical Malpractice Review
services.shortDescription: Hybrid case assessment for potential malpractice litigation.
services.details: Analyzes medical records with partner experts, determines deviations from the standard of care, calculates damages frameworks, and advises on litigation timelines.

services.title: Real Estate Law Guidance
services.shortDescription: On-site consultation for investors managing acquisitions, leases, and closings.
services.details: Reviews purchase agreements and leases, flags zoning or title issues, coordinates due diligence checklists, and maps critical closing milestones.

services.title: Tax Law Advisory
services.shortDescription: Hybrid tax planning session for small and mid-sized businesses.
services.details: Evaluates corporate structure, highlights deductions and credits, coordinates an estimated tax payment schedule, and provides a compliance calendar.

services.title: Wrongful Death Litigation
services.shortDescription: In-person representation plan for wrongful death and catastrophic injury actions.
services.details: Reconstructs the incident timeline, engages expert witnesses, projects damages and settlement ranges, and outlines litigation and negotiation phases.
